titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to promote fiscal responsibility by requiring the application of the House PAYGO rule.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 7/22/2009--Introduced. Amends Rule XXI (Restrictions on Certain Bills) of the Rules of the House of Representatives to make it out of order to consider a rule or order that waives the application of the Pay-As-You-Go (PAYGO) rule in the House. Prescribes a procedure for disposing of a related point of order. Makes it out of order for the Speaker to entertain a motion to suspend application of the PAYGO rule.
